projects.name: Exploring Game Space with Flappy Bird
projects.shortDescription: A simulation of Flappy Bird which allows for customizable game space and an auto-player
projects.longDescription: My primary task with this project was to break out the parameters of Flappy Bird into a format which a user could modify on the fly. Additionally, I worked on the AI that navigated the level and tested the difficulty of the user-generated game space.
responsibilities: Developed an Artifical Intelligence to navigate and test the difficulty of generated game space
Developed controls to allow users to set various parameters within the game space
Implemented parameterized deviation to the auto-player to better model human play

projects.name: Tri-Grid
projects.shortDescription: A randomized image generator for unique, interesting accent or background images
projects.longDescription: My goals with this project were to produce a dynamic element I could use on my portfolio while learning more about React, javascript, and HTML canvases. Not only did I achieve those goals, I made an interactive tool to tweak parameters on the fly, and made a tool that can be integrated into other projects as well.
responsibilities: Developed an algorithm to generate unique, randomized grids
Developed React components to allow easy implementation into other projects
